title: "AMD proved that Apple skipping 4nm chips isn't a big deal"
excerpt: "AMD said at CES that its use of a 4nm process helps its new chips beat two-year old Apple Silicon, but in doing so, it revealed that a jump to 4nm was not a big deal for Apple's future chip releases."
